languages.text: Открыто приняв покровительство Бога черепов, Каллигос Винтерскейл огненным смерчем пронесся по Простору, бомбардируя мирные планеты и истребляя корабли. Владения его династии превратились в рассадник пиратства и богохульной ереси, взывавший к немедленному очищению.

After openly embracing the patronage of the Skull God, Calligos Winterscale swept over the Expanse like a fiery tornado, bombing peaceful planets and destroying voidships. His dynasty's realm became a nest of piracy and heresy that required immediate purging.
languages.original_text: Открыто приняв покровительство Бога черепов, Каллигос Винтерскейл огненным смерчем пронесся по Простору, бомбардируя мирные планеты и истребляя корабли. Владения его династии превратились в рассадник пиратства и богохульной ереси, взывавший к немедленному очищению.

traits.locale_text: After openly embracing the patronage of the Skull God, Calligos Winterscale swept over the Expanse like a fiery tornado, bombing peaceful planets and destroying voidships. The realm of his dynasty turned into the nest of piracy and heretical blasphemy, eliciting an immediate purging effort.

After openly embracing the patronage of the Skull God, Calligos Winterscale swept over the Expanse like a fiery tornado, bombing peaceful planets and destroying voidships. The realm of his dynasty turned into the nest of piracy and heretical blasphemy, eliciting an immediate purging effort.

After openly embracing the patronage of the Skull God, Calligos Winterscale swept over the Expanse like a fiery tornado, bombing peaceful planets and destroying voidships. His dynasty's realm became a nest of piracy and heresy that required immediate purging.

After openly embracing the patronage of the Skull God, Calligos Winterscale swept over the Expanse like a fiery tornado, bombing peaceful planets and destroying voidships. His dynasty's realm became a nest of piracy and heresy that required immediate purging.

After openly embracing the patronage of the Skull God, Calligos Winterscale swept over the Expanse like a fiery tornado, bombing peaceful planets and destroying voidships. His dynasty's realm became a nest of piracy and heresy that required immediate purging.

languages.text: 卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔公然接受颅骨之神的庇护之后，化身成了一股炽热的风暴，席卷了整个科罗努斯扩区。他轰炸了无数和平的行星，摧毁了遭遇的一切虚空舰。他的王朝变成了海盗与异端分子的巢穴，需要立刻进行净化。
languages.original_text: After openly embracing the patronage of the Skull God, Calligos Winterscale swept over the Expanse like a fiery tornado, bombing peaceful planets and destroying voidships. His dynasty's realm became a nest of piracy and heresy that required immediate purging.

traits.locale_text: 卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔公然接受颅骨之神的庇护之后，化身成了一股炽热的风暴，席卷了整个科罗努斯扩区。他轰炸了无数和平的行星，摧毁了遭遇的一切虚空舰。他的王朝变成了海盗与异端分子的巢穴，需要立刻进行净化。

languages.text: Nachdem Calligos Winterzunder offen den Schutz des Schädelgottes akzeptiert hatte, fegte er über die Ausdehnung wie ein feuriger Tornado, bombardierte friedliche Planeten und zerstörte Raumschiffe. Das Reich seiner Dynastie wurde zu einem Nest der Piraterie und Ketzerei, das unverzüglich gesäubert werden musste.
languages.original_text: After openly embracing the patronage of the Skull God, Calligos Winterscale swept over the Expanse like a fiery tornado, bombing peaceful planets and destroying voidships. His dynasty's realm became a nest of piracy and heresy that required immediate purging.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem Calligos Winterzunder offen den Schutz des Schädelgottes akzeptiert hatte, fegte er über die Ausdehnung wie ein feuriger Tornado, bombardierte friedliche Planeten und zerstörte Raumschiffe. Das Reich seiner Dynastie wurde zu einem Nest der Piraterie und Ketzerei, das unverzüglich gesäubert werden musste.

languages.text: Après s'être ouvertement placé sous la protection du Dieu des Crânes, Calligos Winterscale s'abattit comme une tornade sur les Étendues pour bombarder des planètes paisibles et détruire des vaisseaux. Le domaine de sa dynastie devint un nid de pirates et un foyer d'hérésie qui dut être purifié toutes affaires cessantes.
languages.original_text: After openly embracing the patronage of the Skull God, Calligos Winterscale swept over the Expanse like a fiery tornado, bombing peaceful planets and destroying voidships. His dynasty's realm became a nest of piracy and heresy that required immediate purging.

traits.locale_text: Après s'être ouvertement placé sous la protection du Dieu des Crânes, Calligos Winterscale s'abattit comme une tornade sur les Étendues pour bombarder des planètes paisibles et détruire des vaisseaux. Le domaine de sa dynastie devint un nid de pirates et un foyer d'hérésie qui dut être purifié toutes affaires cessantes.

languages.text: Una vez aceptó abiertamente el apoyo del Dios de los Cráneos, Calligos Winterscale arrasó la Extensión como un imparable tornado, bombardeando planetas pacíficos y destruyendo tantas naves como se cruzaba. El reino de su dinastía se convirtió en un nido de piratería y herejía que pedía a gritos una purga.
languages.original_text: After openly embracing the patronage of the Skull God, Calligos Winterscale swept over the Expanse like a fiery tornado, bombing peaceful planets and destroying voidships. His dynasty's realm became a nest of piracy and heresy that required immediate purging.

traits.locale_text: Una vez aceptó abiertamente el apoyo del Dios de los Cráneos, Calligos Winterscale arrasó la Extensión como un imparable tornado, bombardeando planetas pacíficos y destruyendo tantas naves como se cruzaba. El reino de su dinastía se convirtió en un nido de piratería y herejía que pedía a gritos una purga.

languages.text: 髑髏の神の庇護を公然と授かったカリゴス・ウィンタースケールは、猛烈な嵐となってエクスパンスを一掃した。平和な惑星に爆撃を仕掛けてはヴォイドシップを壊していったのだ。王朝の内部には海賊と異教徒の悪行が横行し、迅速な粛正が求められた。
languages.original_text: After openly embracing the patronage of the Skull God, Calligos Winterscale swept over the Expanse like a fiery tornado, bombing peaceful planets and destroying voidships. His dynasty's realm became a nest of piracy and heresy that required immediate purging.

traits.locale_text: 髑髏の神の庇護を公然と授かったカリゴス・ウィンタースケールは、猛烈な嵐となってエクスパンスを一掃した。平和な惑星に爆撃を仕掛けてはヴォイドシップを壊していったのだ。王朝の内部には海賊と異教徒の悪行が横行し、迅速な粛正が求められた。

languages.text: Kafatası Tanrısı'nın hükümdarlığına ayan beyan kucak açan Calligos Winterscale; Enginlik'i bir kasırga misali silkeledi, barışçıl gezegenleri bombaladı ve uçsuz gemilerini yok etti. Hanedanlığının diyarları, ivedilikle arındırılması gereken bir korsanlık ve kâfirlik yuvasına dönüştü.
languages.original_text: After openly embracing the patronage of the Skull God, Calligos Winterscale swept over the Expanse like a fiery tornado, bombing peaceful planets and destroying voidships. His dynasty's realm became a nest of piracy and heresy that required immediate purging.

traits.locale_text: Kafatası Tanrısı'nın hükümdarlığına ayan beyan kucak açan Calligos Winterscale, Enginlik üzerinde bir hortum gibi esti, barış içindeki gezegenleri bombaladı ve uçsuz gemilerini yok etti. Hanedanlığının diyarları, ivedilikle arındırılması gereken bir korsanlık ve kâfirlik yuvasına dönüştü.
